GR13saulahpu:0: śivaḥ śaktyā yukto yadi bhavati śaktaḥ prabhavituṃ
GR13saulahpu:1: na ced evaṃ devo na khalu kuśalaḥ spanditum api /
GR13saulahpu:3: praṇantuṃ stotuṃ vā katham akṛtapuṇyaḥ prabhavati // Saul_1 //
GR13saulahpu:6: vahaty enaṃ śauriḥ katham api sahasreṇa śirasāṃ
GR13saulahpu:14: bhayāt trātuṃ dātuṃ phalam api ca vāñchāsamadhikaṃ
GR13saulahpu:15: śaraṇye lokānāṃ tava hi caraṇāv eva nipuṇau // Saul_4 //
GR13saulahpu:17: purā nārī bhūtvā puraripum api kṣobham anayat /
GR13saulahpu:19: munīnām apy antaḥ prabhavati hi mohāya mahatām // Saul_5 //
GR13saulahpu:20: dhanuḥ pauṣpaṃ maurvī madhukaramayī pañca viśikhā
GR13saulahpu:22: tathāpy ekaḥ sarvaṃ himagirisute kām api kṛpāṃ
GR13saulahpu:23: apāṅgāt te labdhvā jagad idam anaṅgo vijayate // Saul_6 //
GR13saulahpu:26: dhanur bāṇān pāśaṃ sṛṇim api dadhānā karatalaiḥ
GR13saulahpu:27: purastād āstāṃ naḥ puramathitur āhopuruṣikā // Saul_7 //
GR13saulahpu:31: bhajanti tvāṃ dhanyāḥ kati cana cidānandalaharīm // Saul_8 //
GR13saulahpu:32: mahīṃ mūlādhāre kam api maṇipūre hutavahaṃ
GR13saulahpu:33: sthitaṃ svādhiṣṭhāne hṛdi marutam ākāśam upari /
GR13saulahpu:34: mano 'pi bhrūmadhye sakalam api bhittvā kulapathaṃ
GR13saulahpu:35: sahasrāre padme saha rahasi patyā viharasi // Saul_9 //
GR13saulahpu:39: svam ātmānaṃ kṛtvā svapiṣi kulakuṇḍe kuhariṇi // Saul_10 //
GR13saulahpu:43: trirekhābhiḥ sārdhaṃ tava caraṇakoṇāḥ pariṇatāḥ // Saul_11 //
GR13saulahpu:54: divi dviḥṣattriṃśan manasi ca catuḥṣaṣṭir iti ye
GR13saulahpu:55: mayūkhās teṣām apy upari tava pādāmbujayugam // Saul_14 //
GR13saulahpu:58: sakṛn na tvā natvā katham iva stāṃ saṃnidadhate
GR13saulahpu:61: bhajante ye santaḥ kati cid aruṇām eva bhavatīm /
GR13saulahpu:63: gabhīrābhir vāgbhir vidadhati satāṃ rañjanam amī // Saul_16 //
GR13saulahpu:65: vaśinyādyābhis tvāṃ saha janani saṃcintayati yaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:66: sa kartā kāvyānāṃ bhavati mahatāṃ bhaṅgisubhagair
GR13saulahpu:69: divaṃ sarvām urvīm aruṇimanigmagnāṃ smarati yaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:71: sahorvaśyā vaśyāḥ katikati na gīrvāṇagaṇikā // Saul_18 //
GR13saulahpu:72: mukhaṃ binduṃ kṛtvā kucayugam adhas tasya tadadho
GR13saulahpu:73: harārdhaṃ dhyāyed yo haramahiṣi te manmathakalām /
GR13saulahpu:74: sa sadyaḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ nayati vanitā ity atilaghu
GR13saulahpu:75: trilokīm apy āśu bhramayati ravīndustanayugām // Saul_19 //
GR13saulahpu:77: hṛdi tvām ādhatte himakaraśilāmūrtim iva yaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:78: sa sarpāṇāṃ darpaṃ śamayati śakuntādhipa iva
GR13saulahpu:81: niṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇām apy upari kamalānāṃ tava kalām /
GR13saulahpu:84: bhavāni tvaṃ dāse mayi vitara dṛṣṭiṃ sakaruṇāṃ
GR13saulahpu:85: iti stotuṃ vāñchan kathayati bhavāni tvam iti yaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:88: tvayā hṛtvā vāmaṃ vapur aparitṛptena manasā
GR13saulahpu:89: śarīrārdhaṃ śaṃbhor aparam api śaṅke hṛtam abhūt /
GR13saulahpu:90: tathā hi tvadrūpaṃ sakalam aruṇābhaṃ trinayanaṃ
GR13saulahpu:92: jagat sūte dhātā harir avati rudraḥ kṣapayate
GR13saulahpu:93: tiras kurvann etat svam api vapur īśas tirayati /
GR13saulahpu:94: sadāpūrvaḥ sarvaṃ tad idam anugṛhṇāti ca śivas
GR13saulahpu:97: bhavet pūjā pūjā tava caraṇayor yā viracitā /
GR13saulahpu:99: sthitā hy ete śaśvan mukulitakarottaṃsamukuṭāḥ // Saul_25 //
GR13saulahpu:100: virañciḥ pañcatvaṃ vrajati harir āpnoti viratiṃ
GR13saulahpu:101: vināśaṃ kīnāśo bhajati dhanado yāti nidhanam /
GR13saulahpu:103: mahāsaṃhāre +asmin viharati sati tvatpatir asau // Saul_26 //
GR13saulahpu:104: japo jalpaḥ śilpaṃ sakalam api mudrāviracanā
GR13saulahpu:107: saparyāparyāyas tava bhavatu yan me vilasitam // Saul_27 //
GR13saulahpu:115: na śaṃbhos tanmūlaṃ tava janani tāṭaṅkamahimā // Saul_29 //
GR13saulahpu:123: svatantraṃ te tantraṃ kṣititalam avātītarad idam // Saul_31 //
GR13saulahpu:124: śivaḥ śaktiḥ kāmaḥ kṣitir atha raviḥ śītakiraṇaḥ
GR13saulahpu:125: smaro haṃsaḥ śakras tad anu ca parāmāraharayaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:127: bhajante varṇās te tava janani nāmāvayavatām // Saul_32 //
GR13saulahpu:128: smaraṃ yoniṃ lakṣmīṃ tritayam idam ādau tava manor
GR13saulahpu:136: manas tvaṃ vyoma tvaṃ marud asi marutsārathir asi
GR13saulahpu:137: tvam āpas tvaṃ bhūmis tvayi pariṇatāyāṃ na hi param /
GR13saulahpu:143: nirāloke loko nivasati hi bhālokabhavane // Saul_36 //
GR13saulahpu:149: bhaje haṃsadvaṃdvaṃ kim api mahatāṃ mānasacaram /
GR13saulahpu:151: yad ādatte doṣād guṇam akhilam adbhyaḥ paya iva // Saul_38 //
GR13saulahpu:153: tam īḍe saṃvartaṃ janani mahatīṃ tāṃ ca samayām /
GR13saulahpu:155: dayārdrā dṛṣṭis te śiśiram upacāraṃ racayati // Saul_39 //
GR13saulahpu:158: tava śyāmaṃ meghaṃ kam api maṇipūraikaśaraṇaṃ
GR13saulahpu:163: sanāthābhyāṃ jajñe janakajananīmad jagad idam // Saul_41 //
GR13saulahpu:165: kirīṭaṃ te haimaṃ himagirisute kīrtayati yaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:167: dhanuḥ śaunāsīraṃ kim iti na nibadhnāti dhiṣaṇām // Saul_42 //
GR13saulahpu:182: viparyāsanyāsād ubhayam api saṃbhūya ca mithaḥ
GR13saulahpu:187: prakoṣṭhe muṣṭau ca sthagayati nigūḍhāntaram ume // Saul_47 //
GR13saulahpu:188: ahaḥ sūte savyaṃ tava nayanam arkātmakatayā
GR13saulahpu:203: sakhīṣu smerā te mayi janani dṛṣṭiḥ sakaruṇā // Saul_51 //
GR13saulahpu:204: gate karṇābhyarṇaṃ garuta iva pakṣmāṇi dadhatī
GR13saulahpu:211: rajaḥ sattvaṃ bibhrat tama iti guṇānāṃ trayam iva // Saul_53 //
GR13saulahpu:214: nadaḥ śoṇo gaṅgā tapanatanayeti dhruvam amuṃ
GR13saulahpu:215: trayāṇāṃ tīrthānām upanayasi saṃbhedam anaghe // Saul_54 //
GR13saulahpu:219: jahāti pratyūṣe niśi ca vighaṭayya praviśati // Saul_55 //
GR13saulahpu:222: tvadunmeṣāj jātaṃ jagad idam aśeṣaṃ pralayataḥ
GR13saulahpu:223: paritrātuṃ śaṅke parihṛtanimeṣās tava dṛśaḥ // Saul_56 //
GR13saulahpu:225: davīyāṃsaṃ dīnaṃ snapaya kṛpayā mām api śive /
GR13saulahpu:226: anenāyaṃ dhanyo bhavati na ca te hānir iyatā
GR13saulahpu:227: vane vā harmye vā samakaranipāto himakaraḥ // Saul_57 //
GR13saulahpu:233: catuścakraṃ manye tava mukham idaṃ manmatharatham /
GR13saulahpu:235: mahāvīro māraḥ pramathapataye svaṃ jitavate // Saul_59 //
GR13saulahpu:239: jhaṇatkārais tāraiḥ prativacanam ācaṣṭae iva te // Saul_60 //
GR13saulahpu:241: tvadīyo nedīyaḥ phalatu phalam asmākam ucitam /
GR13saulahpu:243: samṛddhyā yas tāsāṃ bahir api ca muktāmaṇidharaḥ // Saul_61 //
GR13saulahpu:247: tulām adhyāroḍhuṃ katham iva vilajjeta kalayā // Saul_62 //
GR13saulahpu:251: pibanti svacchandaṃ niśiniśi bhṛśaṃ kāñcikadhiyā // Saul_63 //
GR13saulahpu:253: japāpuṣpacchāyā tava janani jihvā jayati sā /
GR13saulahpu:263: nijāṃ vīṇāṃ vāṇī niculayati colena nibhṛtam // Saul_66 //
GR13saulahpu:267: kathaṃkāraṃ brūmas tava cibukam aupamyarahitam // Saul_67 //
GR13saulahpu:275: trayāṇāṃ grāmāṇāṃ sthitiniyamasīmāna iva te // Saul_69 //
GR13saulahpu:281: karāṇāṃ te kāntiṃ kathaya kathayāmaḥ katham ume /
GR13saulahpu:282: kayā cid vā sāmyaṃ bhajatu kalayā hanta kamalaṃ
GR13saulahpu:285: tavedaṃ naḥ khedaṃ haratu satataṃ prasnutamukham /
GR13saulahpu:287: svakumbhau herambaḥ parimṛśati hastena jhaṭiti // Saul_72 //
GR13saulahpu:295: pratāpavyāmiśrāṃ puravijayinaḥ kīrtim iva te // Saul_74 //
GR13saulahpu:298: dayāvatyā dattaṃ draviḍaśiśur āsvādya tava yat
GR13saulahpu:299: kavīnāṃ prauḍhānām ajani kamaniyaḥ kavayitā // Saul_75 //
GR13saulahpu:303: janas tāṃ jānīte janani tava romāvalir iti // Saul_76 //
GR13saulahpu:305: kṛśe madhye kiṃ cij janani tava tad bhāti sudhiyām /
GR13saulahpu:307: tanūbhūtaṃ vyoma praviśad iva nābhīkuhariṇīm // Saul_77 //
GR13saulahpu:310: rater līlāgāraṃ kim api tava nābhīti girije
GR13saulahpu:313: namanmūrter nābhau baliṣu śanakais truṭyatae iva /
GR13saulahpu:318: tava trātuṃ bhaṅgād alam iti vilagnaṃ tanubhuvā
GR13saulahpu:319: tridhā naddhaṃ devi trivali lavalīvallibhir iva // Saul_80 //
GR13saulahpu:322: atas te vistīrṇo gurur ayam aśeṣāṃ vasumatīṃ
GR13saulahpu:323: nitambaprāgbhāraḥ sthagayati laghutvaṃ nayati ca // Saul_81 //
GR13saulahpu:325: ubhābhyām ūrubhyām ubhayam api nirjitya bhavatī /
GR13saulahpu:329: niṣaṅgau jaṅghe te viṣamaviśikho bāḍham akṛta /
GR13saulahpu:332: śrutīnāṃ mūrdhāno dadhati tava yau śekharatayā
GR13saulahpu:333: mamāpy etau mātaḥ śirasi dayayā dhehi caraṇau /
GR13saulahpu:345: niśāyāṃ nidrāṇāṃ niśi ca parabhāge ca viśadau /
GR13saulahpu:347: sarojaṃ tvatpādau janani jayataś citram iha kim // Saul_87 //
GR13saulahpu:348: padaṃ te kāntīnāṃ prapadam apadaṃ devi vipadāṃ
GR13saulahpu:351: yad ādāya nyastaṃ dṛṣadi dayamānena manasā // Saul_88 //
GR13saulahpu:353: tarūṇāṃ divyānāṃ hasata iva te caṇḍi caraṇau /
GR13saulahpu:355: daridrebhyo bhadrāṃ śriyam aniśam ahnāya dadatau // Saul_89 //
GR13saulahpu:361: carantas te khelaṃ bhavanakalahaṃsā na jahati /
GR13saulahpu:365: śirīṣābhā citte dṛṣad iva kaṭhorā kucataṭe /
GR13saulahpu:367: jagat trātuṃ śaṃbhor jayati karuṇā kā cid aruṇā // Saul_92 //
GR13saulahpu:370: tathā hy ete nītāḥ śatamakhamukhāḥ siddhim atulāṃ
GR13saulahpu:375: śarīrī śṛṅgāro rasa iva dṛśāṃ dogdhi kutukam // Saul_94 //
GR13saulahpu:379: vidhir bhūyobhūyo nibiḍayati nūnaṃ tava kṛte // Saul_95 //
GR13saulahpu:381: niṣevye nitye tvām aham iti sadā bhāvayati yaḥ /
GR13saulahpu:384: kalatraṃ vaidhātraṃ katikati bhajante na kavayaḥ
GR13saulahpu:385: śriyo devyāḥ ko vā na bhavati patiḥ kair api dhanaiḥ /
GR13saulahpu:386: mahādevaṃ hitvā tava sati satīnām acarame
GR13saulahpu:387: kucābhyām āsaṅgaḥ kuravakataror apy asulabhaḥ // Saul_97 //
GR13saulahpu:399: tvadīyābhir vāgbhis tava janani vācāṃ stutir iyam // Saul_100 //
GR13saulahpu:406: harasya tvadbhrāntiṃ manasi janayām āsa madano
GR13saulahpu:407: bhavatyā ye bhaktāḥ pariṇatir amīṣām iyam ume // Saul_102 //
GR13saulahpu:411: nirātaṅke nitye nigamaya mamāpi stutim imām // Saul_103 //
